title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
Title: Azul Board Game by Next Move – Pattern-Building Family Strategy for 2–4 Players

Overview:
Bring vibrant artistry and clever strategy to your table with Azul, the award-winning family board game of tile drafting and pattern building. Designed by Michael Riesling, Azul combines elegant visuals with intuitive gameplay, making it a standout choice for both newcomers and seasoned gamers. Crafted with high-quality components and a premium finish, this edition delivers satisfying tactile play and eye-catching table presence.

Key Features:
- Brand: Next Move
- Theme: Patterns and mosaic artistry
- Genre: Family/Strategy
- Players: 2–4 (best at all counts)
- Designer: Michael Riesling
- Materials: Paper-based game components with high-quality finish
- Components Quality: High-quality tiles and boards for durability and a premium feel

Why You’ll Love It:
- Simple to learn, deeply rewarding: Draft tiles, plan your patterns, and optimize your board for maximum points.
- Engaging for all ages: Quick turns and clear goals keep everyone involved from start to finish.
- Stunning table presence: Bold colors and beautifully designed tiles make every game feel special.
- High replay value: Variable drafting, shifting strategies, and different player counts keep each session fresh.

What’s in the Box:
- Individual player boards
- Central factory displays
- Assorted patterned tiles
- Scoring markers and rulebook

Perfect For:
- Family game nights
- Casual and hobby gamers
- Gift-giving to design and puzzle lovers
- Quick strategic sessions in 30–45 minutes

Step into the palace workshop and create the most gorgeous mosaic—outthink your rivals, perfect your patterns, and claim victory with Azul.
